Articles.Content:
It took me a while to realize I don't have an account here, even though I'm nearing 250 hours played...

Anyway, in those ~250 hours I've played, I've landed on Minmus a million times, the Mun maybe half a million times, Duna once with cheats a year ago, and I've docked stuff maybe as many times as I've gone to Minmus.

Before 1.0 hit I had a career playthrough with two bases on Minmus that could mine karbonite...And I'd say that's the extent of amazing things I've done in KSP.

250 hours and no account? What madness is this?

I've about the same things as you have. Never been to Duna on my own ship, though.

Welcome at last!

250? I had over 9000.

thats a joke welcome to the forums I joy your stay
